original_text:
“They will eat but not have enough;
    they will engage in prostitution but not flourish,
because they have deserted the Lord
    to give themselves
korean_text: 그들이 먹어도 배부르지 아니하며 음행하여도 수효가 늘지 못하니 이는 여호와를 버리고 따르지 아니하였음이니라

sentences.original_text: They will eat but not have enough
they will engage in prostitution but not flourish
because they have deserted the Lord
